Title: Joe's Apartment
Actors: Jerry O'Connell, Megan Ward, Billy West, Reginald Hudlin
Plot: Joe comes from Iowa to New York and, being short of money, wants to find an apartment with very low rent. His quest is successful, but he must share the residence with some 50,000 cockroaches. The insects turn out to be Joe's best friends.
Production: Warner Brothers, Geffen Pictures, MTV Networks
